data.lyric:
[ti:Tusa]
[ar:KAROL G/Nicki Minaj]
[al:Tusa]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.45]Tusa - KAROL G/Nicki Minaj
[00:01.83]Nicki Minaj：
[00:03.50]Que paso contigo
[00:06.01]Dímelo
[00:07.17]Rrrr
[00:08.87]Ovy on the Drums
[00:10.03]Karol G：
[00:11.26]Ya no tiene excusa
[00:13.51]Hoy salió con su amiga dizque pa' matar la tusa
[00:18.38]Que porque un hombre le pago mal
[00:20.56]Esta dura y abusa
[00:22.88]Se cansó de ser buena
[00:24.77]Ahora es ella quien los usa
[00:27.99]Que porque un hombre le pagó mal
[00:30.44]Ya no se le ve sentimental
[00:32.72]Dice que por otro man no llora
[00:35.53]Karol G：
[00:36.81]Pero si le ponen la cancion
[00:40.01]Le da una depresión tonta
[00:43.60]Llorando lo comienza a llamar
[00:46.92]Pero él la dejo en buzón
[00:49.62]Será porque con otra está
[00:53.17]Creyendo que a otra se pueda amar
[00:55.88]Nicki Minaj：
[00:56.18]Pero hice todo este llanto por nada
[00:59.01]Ahora soy una chica mala
[01:01.36]And now you kickin' and screamin' a big toddler
[01:03.62]Don't try to get your friends to come holla holla
[01:07.30]Ayo I used to lay low
[01:09.33]I wasn't in the clubs I was on my J.O
[01:11.65]Until I realized you a epic fail
[01:14.10]So don't tell your guys that I'll send your bail
[01:16.36]'Cause it's a new day I'm in a new place
[01:18.87]Gettin' some new D sittin' on a new face
[01:21.04]'Cause I know I'm the baddest b***h that you ever really met
[01:23.52]You searchin' for a badder b***h and you ain't met her yet
[01:26.36]Ayo tell 'em to back off
[01:28.02]He wanna slack off
[01:29.18]Ain't no more booty calls you gotta jack off
[01:31.57]It's me and Karol G we let them rats talk
[01:33.86]They'll run up on on us 'cause they lettin' the macks off
[01:36.51]Rrrrr
[01:37.02]Karol G：
[01:37.37]Pero si le ponen la cancion
[01:40.66]Le da una depresión tonta
[01:44.21]Llorando lo comienza a llamar
[01:47.58]Pero él la dejo en buzón
[01:50.19]Será porque con otra está
[01:53.65]Creyendo que a otra se pueda amar
[01:56.99]Karol G：
[01:58.48]Un shot pa' la pena profunda
[02:00.81]Y seguimos gastando la funda
[02:03.24]Otro shot pa' la mente
[02:05.21]Pa' que el recuerdo no la atormente
[02:07.65]Ya no le copio a nada
[02:09.94]Su ex ya no vale nada
[02:12.34]Se va pa' disco y solo quiere perrear
[02:14.81]Pero se confunde cuando empieza a tomar
[02:17.12]Ella se cura con rumba
[02:19.48]Y el amor pa' la tumba
[02:21.95]To' los hombre' le zumban
[02:24.20]Karol G：
[02:24.94]Pero si le ponen la cancion
[02:28.26]Le da una depresión tonta
[02:31.71]Llorando lo comienza a llamar
[02:35.06]Pero él la dejo en buzón
[02:37.75]Será porque con otra está
[02:41.29]Creyendo que a otra se pueda amar
[02:43.62]Karol G/Nicki Minaj/Ovy on the Drums：
[02:44.80]Ey Karol G
[02:46.80]Karol G
[02:47.61]Nicki Minaj
[02:49.21]Ey The Queen
[02:52.00]With The Queen
[02:54.55]Ovy on the Drums
data.trans:
[ti:Tusa]
[ar:KAROL G/Nicki Minaj]
[al:Tusa]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.45]//
[00:01.83]//
[00:03.50]你怎么了
[00:06.01]告诉我
[00:07.17]//
[00:08.87]//
[00:10.03]//
[00:11.26]没有借口可用了
[00:13.51]今天她跟她朋友出去转了转 说要走出情伤
[00:18.38]因为有个男人让她伤痕累累
[00:20.56]她妒火中烧
[00:22.88]无用的善良让她疲惫厌倦
[00:24.77]现在到她来掌控一切了
[00:27.99]因为有个男人让她伤痕累累
[00:30.44]现在她不会再哭丧着脸
[00:32.72]她说她不会再为了别的男人哭泣
[00:35.53]//
[00:36.81]但如果把那首歌放出来
[00:40.01]她又会像个傻子一样伤心难过
[00:43.60]嚎啕大哭 开始给他打电话
[00:46.92]但他留给她的只有语音信箱
[00:49.62]因为他和另一个女人在一起
[00:53.17]他相信他有大把女人可以玩弄
[00:55.88]//
[00:56.18]但我什么都做了 除了眼泪什么都没得到
[00:59.01]那我得做个坏女孩了
[01:01.36]现在你跟个小屁孩一样大哭大闹
[01:03.62]别想让你那些狐朋狗友来骚扰我
[01:07.30]我曾经为人低调
[01:09.33]我以前不去夜店 就是个乖乖女
[01:11.65]直到我明白你就是个十足的垃圾
[01:14.10]所以别跟你兄弟们说我会帮你
[01:16.36]因为新生活开始了 我现在在新家里
[01:18.87]有了新男友 有些新体验
[01:21.04]因为我知道自己是你曾经见过最优秀的女人
[01:23.52]你想找个更好的 你是不可能找到的
[01:26.36]叫他们退后
[01:28.02]他想逍遥自在
[01:29.18]你是找不到女人的 自己解决吧
[01:31.57]我和Karol G一起 让这些人渣在那儿叭叭叭
[01:33.86]他们会追着我们屁股后面跑的 因为他们把自己的老大弄走了
[01:36.51]//
[01:37.02]//
[01:37.37]但如果把那首歌放出来
[01:40.66]她又会像个傻子一样伤心难过
[01:44.21]嚎啕大哭 开始给他打电话
[01:47.58]但他留给她的只有语音信箱
[01:50.19]因为他和另一个女人在一起
[01:53.65]他相信他有大把女人可以玩弄
[01:56.99]//
[01:58.48]一杯酒解忧消愁
[02:00.81]我们接着喝
[02:03.24]再一杯抹除记忆
[02:05.21]这样回忆不会再继续折磨她
[02:07.65]我不会再反复重复
[02:09.94]你的前任什么也不是
[02:12.34]他去舞厅只是想找个女人
[02:14.81]但一开始喝酒脑子就会不清醒
[02:17.12]伦巴舞帮她治愈伤痛
[02:19.48]爱情就去坟墓里呆着吧
[02:21.95]所有的臭男人们都给我一边去
[02:24.20]//
[02:24.94]但如果把那首歌放出来
[02:28.26]她又会像个傻子一样伤心难过
[02:31.71]嚎啕大哭 开始给他打电话
[02:35.06]但他留给她的只有语音信箱
[02:37.75]因为他和另一个女人在一起
[02:41.29]他相信他有大把女人可以玩弄
[02:43.62]//
[02:44.80]//
[02:46.80]//
[02:47.61]//
[02:49.21]女王
[02:52.00]携手女皇
[02:54.55]//
